name: DJ One Minute
description:
Oh no! Seems like the DJ got hit by a beer-bottle! 

Now it`s your time to shine! Replace her, as long as she´s uncoscious and create some sick beats for the crowd. 

Careful tho: If they don´t like what you do, you will lose faster than you think...

This game was creates as part of the "Your-choice GAMEJAM 2021". Fully streamed on twitch.

Link to twitch-Account: https://www.twitch.tv/hackundschnack
